metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1001001 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
PluXml version 5.6 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scriptingvulnerability, within the article creation page, which can result inescalation of privileges.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1001001` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pluxml - 5.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pluxml package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.6-1').
